title: 17-year-old trying to break into vehicle shot, killed, JPD says
content:
JACKSON, Miss. —
At 17-year-old was shot and killed Thursday as he tried to break into a car, Jackson police said.
The incident was reported about 12:30 p.m. in the 900 block of McDowell Road, police said.
A man at Performance Oil Equipment saw the teenager breaking into the vehicle and told him to stop, police said. When the teen didn't stop, the man shot him several times in the chest, investigators said.
The teenager, identified as Charles McDonald, was taken to the University of Mississippi Medical Center, where he died, police said.
The case is under investigation and will be forwarded to a grand jury to determine if charges will be filed, police said.
